user_prompt: create epics and user stories for the usecase

epics.title: Project Setup and Architecture
epics.summary: Establish foundational project structure and technology stack.
epics.description: Set up the initial framework for the project, including repository creation, folder structure, environment configuration, and base dependency management. Define architecture patterns, coding guidelines, and continuous integration pipelines to ensure scalability and maintainability.

epics.title: User Authentication and Authorization
epics.summary: Implement secure user login, registration, and role management.
epics.description: Develop user authentication functionality with sign-up, sign-in, password reset, and session management. Introduce role-based access control to differentiate between user types such as admins and regular users. Integrate with industry-standard authentication systems for data security.

epics.title: Core Feature Development
epics.summary: Build core functional modules based on the primary business requirements.
epics.description: Implement main features that define the project’s core purpose. This includes feature flows, business logic, and user interfaces. Ensure data flow between front-end and back-end systems is seamless and test for performance and correctness across workflows.

epics.title: Data Persistence and API Integration
epics.summary: Develop robust back-end services and database integration.
epics.description: Design and integrate necessary APIs to handle CRUD operations and data exchange. Establish connections with the database layer, ensuring efficient data modeling, schema management, and query performance. Implement validation and error-handling mechanisms to ensure reliability.

epics.title: User Interface and Experience Enhancement
epics.summary: Refine and optimize the user interface for better usability and design.
epics.description: Focus on front-end improvements by introducing responsive layouts, optimized loading patterns, and accessible design elements. Incorporate user feedback to refine workflows and ensure the interface aligns with brand guidelines and intuitive navigation principles.

epics.title: Testing, Quality Assurance, and Deployment
epics.summary: Ensure product quality through testing and prepare for production release.
epics.description: Conduct unit, integration, and user acceptance testing to validate all modules. Fix identified defects and optimize for speed and reliability. Prepare deployment pipelines, staging environments, and documentation to ensure a stable release into production.

epics.title: Analytics and Performance Monitoring
epics.summary: Integrate analytics tools and implement performance monitoring systems.
epics.description: Deploy analytics and monitoring systems to track user behavior, system performance, and errors in real time. Use data insights to enhance the application’s responsiveness and identify scalability opportunities for future versions.

epics.title: Advanced Features and Continuous Improvement
epics.summary: Introduce advanced functionalities and ongoing project optimization.
epics.description: Implement advanced or optional features that enhance the user experience and project capabilities. Continuously refine system components based on analytics feedback and emerging requirements, ensuring ongoing value delivery and system evolution.

user_stories.title: Set up repository and define coding conventions
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want a consistent repository setup and clear coding conventions, so that collaboration is efficient and code integrity is maintained.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Repository should use Git, have branches such as main, develop, and feature. Coding conventions must be documented and agreed upon by the team.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a new project, When the repository is set up, Then coding conventions should be accessible to all team members.

user_stories.title: Configure Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want a CI/CD pipeline set up, so that testing and deployment processes are automated.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: CI/CD pipeline should use tools such as GitHub Actions, Jenkins, or GitLab CI. It must handle build, testing, and deployment workflows.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: CI/CD pipeline set up and tested.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a commit to the repository, When the CI/CD pipeline triggers, Then the build, test, and deployment processes should execute.

user_stories.title: Define and manage environment variables and configuration
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want environment variables and configuration managed, so that consistency is maintained across environments.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Configuration files for development, staging, and production environments must be created. Secrets should be managed securely.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Environment configurations documented and securely managed.
user_stories.test_cases: Given different environments, When the application is deployed, Then the appropriate configuration settings should be applied.

user_stories.title: Create user registration and email verification
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to register with an email verification step, so that my account is secure.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Registration form and email/phone verification must be implemented. User data validations and error handling must be in place.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User registration and verification process functional.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an invalid email, When a user tries to register, Then an appropriate error message should be displayed.

user_stories.title: Develop login and logout functionality
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to log in and log out securely, so that my sessions are managed properly.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Use JWT or OAuth for authentication. Ensure that user sessions are managed securely.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Login and logout functionalities implemented and secure.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an incorrect password, When a user tries to log in, Then access should be denied and an error message should be shown.

user_stories.title: Implement password reset and recovery
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to reset my password securely, so that I can regain access to my account.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Password reset flow should use one-time links or verification codes sent via email or phone.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Password reset process is secure and functional.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a legitimate password reset request, When a user follows the provided link, Then they should be able to securely reset their password.

user_stories.title: Design and implement database schema
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want a well-designed database schema, so that the core functionality of the application is supported.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Database should include defined entities, relationships, and constraints. Schema migrations must be version controlled.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Database schema designed, implemented, and version controlled.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a new entity, When the model is defined, Then it should be correctly reflected in the database schema.

user_stories.title: Develop core business logic APIs
user_stories.description: As an API consumer, I want robust backend endpoints, so that I can perform CRUD operations for the main functionalities.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement REST or GraphQL APIs with endpoints for CRUD operations, validation, and error handling.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Core API endpoints implemented and tested.
user_stories.test_cases: Given valid data, When a CRUD operation is performed, Then it should be executed correctly and produce expected results.

user_stories.title: Integrate core user flows in the frontend
user_stories.description: As a user, I want seamless interaction with core features, so that my experience is smooth and error-free.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure that frontend communicates seamlessly with backend APIs and user workflows are smooth.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Core user flows are smooth and error-free.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a correctly implemented backend, When a user interacts with the frontend, Then the data should be correctly retrieved and displayed without errors.

user_stories.title: Design and apply global styles and reusable components
user_stories.description: As a UI/UX designer, I want consistent global styles and components, so that the application’s UI is uniform.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Develop reusable UI components such as buttons, forms, modals, and follow a unified design system.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Global styles and reusable components created.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the global styles, When applied to the application, Then the UI should be consistent and follow the design system.

user_stories.title: Improve mobile responsiveness
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the application to work well on all devices, so that my experience is optimal regardless of screen size.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement responsive design patterns and refactor layouts for different screen sizes.
user_stories.test_cases: Given different devices, When the application is viewed, Then it should be optimally displayed on each screen size.

user_stories.title: Enhance accessibility
user_stories.description: As an accessibility advocate, I want the application to be usable by all users, including those with disabilities.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement WCAG guidelines like proper color contrasts, keyboard navigation, and screen reader compatibility.
user_stories.test_cases: Given accessibility requirements, When using the application, Then it should be compliant with WCAG guidelines.

user_stories.title: Implement application performance monitoring
user_stories.description: As an operations engineer, I want to track system performance, so I can detect and resolve bottlenecks proactively.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Integrate monitoring tools to capture application metrics and detect performance issues.
user_stories.test_cases: Given monitoring tools, When performance metrics are captured, Then performance issues should be detectable in real-time.

user_stories.title: Set up an analytics dashboard
user_stories.description: As a business analyst, I want visibility into system and business metrics, so we can make informed decisions.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Develop an analytics dashboard displaying real-time metrics using tools or built-in modules.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Analytics dashboard set up and functional.
user_stories.test_cases: Given various metrics, When displayed on the dashboard, Then it should reflect real-time data accurately.

user_stories.title: Prepare and execute production deployment
user_stories.description: As a release manager, I want to deploy the application smoothly, so that users experience minimal downtime.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Set up production configurations, test releases, and ensure rollback strategy is in place.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Production deployment prepared and executed with minimal downtime.
user_stories.test_cases: Given production environment, When deploying the application, Then downtime should be minimized and rollback plan ready.
